xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.ultimate_base_curve_process module

class xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.ultimate_base_curve_process.UltimateBaseCurveParams(pillars_days, shift_bp, sigma, lam, delta_floor=1e-08, day_count=365.0)[source]

Bases: object

Parameters for per-pillar shifted exponential Vasicek / OU drivers.

pillars_days: curve pillars in days (K,) shift_bp: per-pillar shift in basis points (K,) or scalar sigma: per-pillar OU vol (K,) (in driver units, consistent with transform) lam: per-pillar mean reversion (K,) (1/year) delta_floor: floor applied to mean function g(t,k) day_count: used to convert pillars_days -> years

pillars_days: ndarray
shift_bp: ndarray
sigma: ndarray
lam: ndarray
delta_floor: float = 1e-08
day_count: float = 365.0
xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.ultimate_base_curve_process.ou_exact_step(x, dt, lam, sigma, z)[source]

Exact OU step (vectorized over pillars; x is (…,K), z is (…,K)). x_{t+dt} = e^{-lam dt} x_t + sqrt( sigma^2 * (1-e^{-2 lam dt})/(2 lam) ) * z

Return type:

ndarray

xva_engine.simulation.risk_factors.ir.ultimate_base_curve_process.transform_shifted_exponential(x, g, s, v2)[source]

Y = (g+s)*exp(x - 0.5 v^2) - s Ensures E[Y]=g when x is OU driver with Var=v^2 and mean 0.

Return type:

ndarray
